name: Port Rilan
role_in_state: primary commercial port and augury center
culture_adjustments: stronger guild and harbour-clan authority over apprenticeship rites
coastal tongue dialect compressed with nautical jargon
public sea-rituals emphasize pragmatic safety over liturgy
ancestor veneration concentrated in shipwright and captain lineages
constraints: ritual auguries consume scarce imported reagents
notes: strategic choke-point for coastal trade routes
saltworks require seasonal influx of migrant labour
